name: Hera
temple_description:
Hera was the third queen of Olympus in ancient Greek mythology and one of the 
wives of Zeus. She was the Goddess of Marriage and Fertility, and one of the 
twelve gods of Olympus. 
She was the incarnation of natural forces and possessed supreme divine power 
and authority in Olympus. Whenever she traveled, she was accompanied by 
powerful thunder and lightning.

active_skills.name: Song of War (Hero Hymn)
active_skills.effect:
Dispels all debuffs on 2 angels with the highest ATK and inflicts an 
[Encourage] state to all allies, increasing their DEF by [100% * Hera's DEF] 
and their ATK by [60% * Hera's DEF] for 3 rounds.

active_skills.name: For the Throne (Supreme Glory)
active_skills.effect:
Deals 150% M.DMG to 6 enemies. 
- If the enemy’s ATK is lower than Hera’s, DMG is doubled. 
- Heals the ally with the lowest HP by 50% of Hera's ATK and dispels all debuffs.

exclusive_ur+_skill.name: Soul Calming Wind
exclusive_ur+_skill.effect: When Hera acts, she dispels all buffs from 1 random enemy.
